PROJECT
CONTACT
Milo is a web application that will help people from all over the world to meet and interact with each other virtually. They can connect, talk and chat with people of similar interests. It is a virtual world to give people a real-time experience even during pandemic situations. Through this, we are trying to make digital communication more natural providing you with a convenient option to either chat or audio chat. We also make sure that your privacy remains untouched. Therefore, we keep the privacy of the users at our topmost priority.

About

Why Milo?
Time zones ain’t no thing
Milo will serve as a medium to fill the gap between real world and virtual world.
Full spectrum of services
Our platform can be used as virtual shopping , gaming rooms, friends hangout groups, networking zone, and many other possibilities.
Impossible? We’re on it
This project is applicable for all users. This web application contributes to society as well.
Flexible work terms
Users are provided with an option to chat and talk with each other
